actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 102-954.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of the feasibility of including Revere Beach, located in the city of Revere, Massachusetts, in the National Park System.

summary.text: Revere Beach Study Act of 1991 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study and report to the President and the Congress on the feasibility of establishing Revere Beach, Massachusetts, as a unit of the National Park System.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of the feasibility of including Revere Beach, located in the city of Revere, Massachusetts, in the National Park System.
